examples: The paperback edition didn't appear for another two years.
And his novel An Absolutely Remarkable Thing is now out in paperback.
And that book is now available in paperback, which is just so much more cozy to hold!
So if you’re the kind of person who waits for the paperback, the wait is over.
words.defineEn: a book with a cover that is made of thick paper
words.defineVi: một cuốn sách có bìa được làm bằng giấy dày

examples: This book bridges a gulf between the metaphysics literature and philosophy of mind literature.
The book raises many important questions.
Every age has its book, after all.
The movie follows the book faithfully.
The movie follows the book faithfully.
words.defineEn: a set of printed pages that are held together in a cover so that we can turn them and read them
words.defineVi: một tập hợp các trang in được giữ lại với nhau trong một trang bìa để chúng ta có thể lật chúng và đọc chúng

examples: The grounds covered eight acres.
The trees were covered in a blanket of snowy white.
The pig's pink skin was covered in coarse hair.
She covered the floor with a colorful carpet.
The book on the shelf had a purple cover.
words.defineEn: something that protects or conceals a thing by being put over, on, or around it
words.defineVi: cái gì đó bảo vệ hoặc che giấu một thứ bằng cách đặt trên, trên hoặc xung quanh nó

words.defineEn: a child that is unusually gifted or intelligent
words.defineVi: một đứa trẻ có năng khiếu hoặc thông minh bất thường

words.defineEn: a business that produces cars in large quantities by using machinery
words.defineVi: một doanh nghiệp sản xuất ô tô với số lượng lớn bằng cách sử dụng máy móc

examples: The classroom is filled with desks, chairs, and a chalkboard.
The teacher placed the books on the desk.
My computer is placed on the desk in the office.
He gave her ticket to the woman at the check-in desk.
The receptionist sat behind the desk, welcoming visitors.
words.defineEn: furniture we use for working, writing, reading, etc. that normally has a flat surface and drawers
words.defineVi: đồ nội thất chúng tôi sử dụng để làm việc, viết, đọc, v.v. thường có bề mặt phẳng và ngăn kéo

examples: Can you raise the lamp
The main roadblock at the moment is producing the lamps.
Bring the lamp to me.'
'Give me the lamp!'
Fire and red smoke came from the lamp.
words.defineEn: an object that can give light by using electricity or burning gas or oil
words.defineVi: một đối tượng có thể cung cấp cho ánh sáng bằng cách sử dụng điện hoặc khí đốt hoặc dầu

examples: As a successful singer-songwriter, she has a large fan base and is sought after by record labels.
The songwriter thought the show would be a success so he wanted a piece of the action.
And legendary singer/songwriter Bob Dylan has sold his entire catalog of songs to Universal Music Publishing Group.
A sometime songwriter himself, he says the process was a revelation.
I'm a music producer and songwriter and I've done a lot of work in the K-pop world.
words.defineEn: someone who writes the words of songs and sometimes their music
words.defineVi: một người viết những lời của bài hát và đôi khi âm nhạc của họ

words.defineEn: an enclosed space with a public phone that someone can pay in order to use it
words.defineVi: một không gian kín với điện thoại công cộng mà ai đó có thể trả tiền để sử dụng nó
